description:
After being tricked by Sho, Kyoko decides to seek revenge on him by also entering the entertainment world.  Kyoko heads to Sho`s rival production company, LME, where she meets Ren Tsuruga.  Although her audition did not go as well as she had hoped, Kyoko vowed: "never give up."  However, why is Kyoko`s new friend, Ren furious at her after she tells him about her plan for revenge?
Source: crunchyroll
